Articles.Content:
Hi Fellow kerbonauts!

Today I present to you my latest beast generation, the HyperBeast Proto 2!

There are two variants:

VTOL Capable

https://www.dropbox.com/s/1u4kxirksdki5tt/HyperBeast.craft?dl=0

Best Looking and Functioning Beast of all, *requires Playing with Infinite Fuel and maybe Unbreakable Connections!

Action Group 1= VTOL

Action Group 2= Toggle Main Engines

Action Group 3= Toggle RAPIER Jet/Rocket mode

https://www.dropbox.com/s/c83665fymzftrr8/666HyperBeast.craft?dl=0

  • Ring Space Station(SSTO?)
  • Advanced Rail gun with dockable self reloading ammo clips
  • Rail gun mounted Hyper Beast

Everyone is invited to test and modify our Beasts, and if you would like to please share your innovation so we can improve together.

Edited July 24, 2015 by JZ6

Sweet Ride! I like how you have to use launch clamps to "hold it back" before takeoff because it's such BEAST!

JR

Edited July 22, 2015 by Jolly_Roger

Hehe it also helps charge up the RAPIER engines so theres that

Edited July 24, 2015 by JZ6

If you are running a Windows-version, I believe alt+printscreen makes a screenshot only of your active window.

Even the most simple, low-res picture says more than a thousand words!

Like this?

All KSP images have been moved here.

JR

Edited September 28, 2015 by Jolly_Roger

Yes! Exactly like that!

Nothing wrong with that picture.

I like grand-tour-craft that can do everything.

What's your reasoning for using the small landing gear bays? Easy entry/exit?

Yes! Exactly like that!

Nothing wrong with that picture.

I like grand-tour-craft that can do everything.

What's your reasoning for using the small landing gear bays? Easy entry/exit?

I just liked the way they look. It's all about style for me, maybe when I redesign it I may use some bigger gear - as long as it looks cool.

JR

I must say, I'm a sucker for looks too.

How about it JZ6?

Show us your stuff!
These front wheels look like the front paws of a T-rex.

I must say, I'm a sucker for looks too.

How about it JZ6?

Show us your stuff!

Hows this?

Low quality but shows design

and vtol lift off!

Got myself a 666 variant - trying it out now.

It's nice to know I'm not the only one who builds with cheats on. Without them, the craft can't always look the best all the time (THERE ARE EXCEPTIONS DON'T HATE) and with cheats, it becomes less about missions and more about fun when making and flying craft.

I had to update my first post on this thread since it was no longer applicable. And of course rep to you for posting pictures of a very nicely designed craft.

JR

Edited July 22, 2015 by Jolly_Roger

Thx guys hope you guys had as much fun playing with it as I did building!

P.S. I just completed my Rail gun with a Revolver style Cylinder Ammo Cartridge(Drum Magazine)!

I will post as soon as testing is complete, stay tuned!

- - - Updated - - -

Got myself a 666 variant - trying it out now.

It's nice to know I'm not the only one who builds with cheats on. Without them, the craft can't always look the best all the time (THERE ARE EXCEPTIONS DON'T HATE) and with cheats, it becomes less about missions and more about fun when making and flying craft.

Haha ya i agree in fact the base variant is just a strip down 666 variant not the other way around lol
